text: Vernazza () is an Italian comune in the Province of La Spezia, in the region of Liguria, Northern Italy. It is part of the Cinque Terre, a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Vernazza is one of ("The most beautiful villages of Italy"). == Culture == The fictional town Sapienza from the 2016 videogame is inspired by Vernazza. == References == == Other websites == * * * Category:1861 establishments in Italy Category:Cinque Terre Category:Settlements in La Spezia
title: Vernazza
